**Reseller Hosting Specials, now with MailChannels & FREE Clientexec!**

Why settle for other reseller hosting providers who cut corners and use other control panels?  The truth is, your end-users are most familiar with cPanel. So increase your conversions today!
With a reseller hosting account powered by cPanel & WHM from RackNerd, you can begin creating (and selling) web hosting, without any technical experience needed. We also provide you with a FREE Clientexec license.

RackNerd’s reseller hosting platform is now leveraging MailChannels to improve email delivery rates to specific email services if and as needed. This feature is implemented at no additional charge. This applies to all cPanel accounts including your sub-users, giving you as a reseller yet another feature to advertise to help increase your sales and value delivery to your end-users.

Deploy Reseller Hosting in Los Angeles, Miami, Germany, or France - choose your location during checkout. Asia (Singapore) available for an optional + $8/yr fee.

WINNERS of the main giveaway WILL BE ANNOUNCED PUBLICLY 12/3/2021 @ 2 PM PST within this thread. Winners will have 48 hrs (after receiving our PM) to claim the prize, if you happen to not claim the prize within 48 hrs, we will be choosing another random winner publicly, and you will automatically be forfeited. Shipping within the USA only. Acct credits applicable globally. Users outside the US who win a physical prize that would normally be shipped within the USA will be offered equivalent item value RackNerd credit. Questions? Feel free to ask within this thread. Best of all, no purchase is necessary to enter our giveaways!
